panels.description: Count of services running in the selected namespace
panels.title: Active Services

panels.description: This panel calculates how much ETH has been consumed in the given time range
panels.title: Total ETH spent in time range

panels.description: How much eth is used. Accumulated by service type
panels.title: ETH spend per minute by service type

panels.description: Tracks how much CPU the main process is using (this does not account for bb/acvm)
panels.title: CPU use

panels.description: Tracks how much memory the main process is using (this does not account for bb/acvm)
panels.title: Memory use

panels.description: Tracks how much memory the main process is using (this does not account for bb/acvm)
panels.title: Memory change 24Hrs

panels.description:
How big trees are relative to each other. 
NOTE: The L1 to L2 message tree has empty leaves added to it for every block!
panels.title: Relative tree sizes

panels.description: Tracks tree nodes, indexes, metadata. It's normal for tree sizes to fluctuate even if there are no reorgs (trees garbage collect old data)
panels.title: Tree size

panels.description: Components synch at different rates, can restart for upgrades (resetting their graph), see multiple reorgs, etc
panels.title: Blocks synched from rollup
